term.title: Szilard–Chalmers effect

item.text: The rupture of the chemical bond between an atom and the molecule of which the atom is part, as a result of a nuclear reaction of that atom.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2525 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
